title: Screen Time: How average is your daily usage?
intro: Estimate your average daily screen time (hours per day). We’ll compare it with typical usage.

labels.label: Below average
labels.advice: Nice balance. Keep using focus blocks and breaks.

labels.label: Around average
labels.advice: You’re around the norm. Consider app timers for better habits.

labels.label: Above average
labels.advice: Try reducing notifications and batching social media time.

seo.title: Screen Time Test — How average is your daily usage?
seo.description: Compare your daily screen time with typical usage and get simple tips to improve your digital balance.
